title: Peanut butter jelly time!
content:
I have a new favorite part of my day, and its called peanut butter jelly time.

Its when I stop everything I'm doing, and delicately put together a peanut butter and jelly sandwich, and wash it down with a delicious glass of milk.

Here's the recipe!

comments.comment: Sounds amazing, I will incorporate that into my day.
You have to add the fluffernutter or you are missing out!
